kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3301/auth path_url=/auth headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '49', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "papito@msn.com", "password": "pwd123"}'

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
